metadata.title: Tuesday, 17th March, 2020
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that the Kopa-Mpika road in Kanchibiya Parliamentary Constituency has become almost impassable, following heavy rains; and
(b) if so, what urgent measures are being taken to address the problem to avoid Kopa being cut off from Mpika.
(a) when the Government will render assistance to the residents of the following areas in Chinsali Parliamentary Constituency whose houses and crops were washed away following heavy rains:

(i) Mbesuma in Chilinda Ward; (ii) Mulolo, Chintankwa, Mushinda, Kapeta, Subi, Lupambo, Mpundu Subi and Misonta in Chambeshi Ward; and (iii) Moonga, Mulenga Swali, Ntomombo, Kabosha, Kamweo, Isaac Chibingo, part of Mwalule and Nshitima in Mikunku Ward;
(b) how many families are affected; and
(c) what assistance will be rendered in terms of the following:
